name: Diesel - Wicked - Witches Brew
additionalNotes: Pitch black, long-leaf ligeros cultivated from the rich, volcanic soils of Nicaragua’s top growing regions. Binders hand selected from top-priming Habano leaves grown in Esteli, Nicaragua. Thick, Broadleaf maduro ligero wrappers from Pennsylvania glistening with oils. These are the components used to craft Diesel Wicked. A full-bodied, full-flavored apparition formed by the hands of a master. The weak and timid need not apply - Wicked yields a bold assortment of deep nuances and spicy undertones. Oak, leather, dark tobacco, roasted espresso bean, black pepper, red pepper.
